page.title: 19FARMING
page.content: {SPRING HILL HOUSE Mrs Banks runs two enterprises (1){A CARAVAN SITE}Which has 5 permanant places and other spaces for holiday season & royal show traffic. (2){A STUD FARM}This breeds Palamino Arab horses (about 4 foals a year) & Limousin sheep.One stallion came first at the ROYAL SHOW in 1985. {REDFERN MANOR}.Owner D.Lowe.256 acres 14th century with 18th century addns. 12th century Tithe barn covered with corrugated iron but intact.12 acre woodland and rare flora(Burnet/cockle) All beef Hereford X Fresian outlet is 4 butchers shops owned by farmer. {RUDFIN MANOR}.Owner Mrs Sayers & Mrs Liggins,+3 staff 15th century hunting lodge,oak beams,huge'Welsh staircase', diamond leaded windows still survive. Interior original furniture/fireplace from Kenilworth Castle sunken garden.
